name: the tinies
description:
The tinies is a tiny story about tiny peeps being stepped on by a very strange monster.

It is not a very finished game at all, but it does have a win condition that may even be reachable (spoiler: build a barracks, and make enough peeps enter it.)

----

Controls:

Drag buildings from UI to build, or drag to reposition them after building.

[LMB] to draw paths and [RMB] to erase (they're purely cosmetic, but really cute.)

[Wheel] or [Arrows] to rotate while spawning.

DO NOT PRESS [Esc], as it resets the whole game.

Cheats:

Spam [Enter] to receive resources from thin air, in case you softlock your tiny town.

Press [B] to go to straight to last sandboxish level, skipping the intro and other levels.

----

Technical:

Unity WebGL

~50MB load size

Mouse only Time to beat: 10min

----

Credits:

Writing, design, and general gamedeving: rava.games

Intro music: Parijat Mishra - Misfits

Game music: Parijat Mishra - Raindrops

Narrator: TTS synthesis via Tacotron 2

Everything else: Public domain, or licensed for use
